messages.title: We're supporting Angela Smith
messages.content: Testimonies from Penistone West Councillor, a High Green resident, and local party members

leaflet.personalStatement: "It has been a privilege representing you in Parliament these past years. I'm now standing as your candidate again. I am standing on my record and I will stand up for Penistone & Stocksbridge. We need someone who lives locally, who understands our aspirations and who will make sure our voices are heard."

contactInformation.address: Maria House, Fox Valley House, Stocksbridge, Sheffield, S36 2AA

endorsements.endorsement: support from former Penistone West Councillor
support from High Green resident and active community member
support from local party member and activist for over 25 years
support from mother noting Angela's sincere care and hard work

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet provides a personalized appeal from the candidate along with endorsements from local members of the community. There is also an element which asks voters to communicate their concerns directly to the candidate.
